tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE traffic_monitoring (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    traffic_flow INT,
    congestion_level VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE TrafficIncidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    camera_id INT,
    incident_type VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (camera_id) REFERENCES TrafficCameras(camera_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TrafficFlow (
    flow_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    camera_id INT,
    flow_rate INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (camera_id) REFERENCES TrafficCameras(camera_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CongestionLevels (
    congestion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    camera_id INT,
    congestion_level VARCHAR(20),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (camera_id) REFERENCES TrafficCameras(camera_id)
);
